goal: Your goal is to find out if you can return a product you bought 13 days ago.

conversation.message: Bon dia! Vaig comprar un producte fa 13 dies i voldria saber si el puc retornar. Em podríeu indicar si encara sóc dins del termini de devolució i quin és el procediment, si us plau?

Bon dia!

Sí, ets dins del termini de devolució sense cap problema. El nostre període estàndard és de 60 dies a partir de la data de compra sempre que l’article estigui sense utilitzar i amb les etiquetes originals. Si l’has fet servir i presenta algun defecte, també el pots retornar perquè estàs dins dels 14 dies per a producte usat defectuós (tot just en portes 13).

Procés de devolució:

1. Reuneix la documentació  
   • Tiquet o comprovant de compra (digital o en paper).  
   • Embalatge i etiquetes originals.  
   • Qualsevol accessori inclòs (bosses de transport, peces extra, instruccions, etc.).

2. Tria com vols fer la devolució  
   A) A qualsevol de les nostres botigues (Boulder, Denver, Fort Collins, Durango o Salt Lake City).  
      • Porta el producte i el tiquet.  
      • Un/a empleat/ada revisarà l’estat i et processarà la devolució o canvi al moment.  
      • El reemborsament es fa al mateix mètode de pagament; sol trigar 3-5 dies hàbils a reflectir-se.  

   B) Online (si vas comprar per la web o prefereixes enviar-lo)  
      • Entra al teu compte a mountainpeakoutdoor.com i selecciona “Retornar/Canviar un article”.  
      • Escull el producte, indica el motiu i imprimeix l’etiqueta d’enviament prepagada.  
      • Empaqueta l’article de manera segura i deixa’l al punt de recollida indicat (UPS o USPS, segons la teva zona).  
      • Un cop el rebem i comprovem l’estat, t’enviarem un correu de confirmació i processarem el reemborsament.

3. Terminis  
   • Revisió en botiga: immediata.  
   • Revisió en magatzem (enviament): 2-3 dies un cop arribi; reemborsament en 3-5 dies addicionals.

4. Excepcions comunes  
   • Productes personalitzats o targetes regal no són reemborsables.  
   • Si el producte presenta danys per ús incorrecte, podríem derivar-te al nostre servei de reparacions, que sovint és gratuït per a articles comprats a Mountain Peak.

Necessites ajuda addicional o vols canviar l’article per una altra talla/model en lloc de reemborsar-lo? Fes-m’ho saber i t’ho gestiono!

quality.reasoning: The conversation is highly efficient and useful. The customer asked a clear, focused question about return eligibility and procedures. The store provided a single, comprehensive response that directly addressed both parts of the inquiry without requiring back-and-forth clarification. The response was well-organized, detailed, and actionable. No redundancy or circular discussion occurred. The only minor limitation is that it's somewhat lengthy, but given the complexity of explaining return procedures (documentation, methods, timelines, exceptions), the length is justified and adds value rather than detracting from efficiency.

correctness.reasoning: The information provided appears accurate and relevant to the customer's inquiry about return policies and procedures. The store clearly explained the 60-day standard return period, the 14-day window for defective used products, and provided detailed steps for both in-store and online returns. All information is directly related to answering the customer's question. No irrelevant personal commentary or off-topic discussions were present. The response is factually consistent and appropriate for a retail customer service context.

grammar.reasoning: The conversation is entirely in Catalan with proper spelling, grammar, and syntax throughout. Both parties use correct Catalan vocabulary and sentence structure. The store's response is well-formatted with clear numbering and bullet points. There are no Spanish, English, or other language intrusions. The language is professional and appropriate. Minor aspects like the use of 'tiquet' (accepted Catalan spelling) and proper use of contractions and accents are all correct. Overall, this is high-quality Catalan with no significant errors.

completeness.reasoning: The customer asked if they are within the return period and what the return procedure is. The store provided a comprehensive answer confirming they are within the 60-day return window, explained both options for returns (13 days is well within the timeframe), and detailed the complete step-by-step process including required documentation, return methods (in-store vs online), timelines, and exceptions. The store also offered additional help. However, the customer did not explicitly confirm satisfaction or that their question was fully answered - the conversation ended with the store's response and no follow-up from the customer.
